summary: This collection of documents pertains to the contract employment of Terence S. CRABANAC with the CIA from 1965 to 1970. It includes contracts, amendments, and memoranda regarding his compensation, allowances, travel, operational expenses, benefits, and cover activities. Key topics include his assignment to Spain, housing allowances, royalty retention, and transition from staff employee to contract employee.
title: Terence S. CRABANAC Contract Employment Records
sender: Chief, Contract Personnel Division and various other CIA offices
